#summary Use Case: ModifyRoster
#labels UseCase,Teacher

==UseCases==


= ModifyRoster =


|| Use Case || ModifyRoster ||
||Identified || T5 ||
|| Description: || The ModifyRoster use case models a Teacher adding and/or removing one or more student from any of their classes.||
||Actors|| Teacher||
|| Preconditions: || 1. Teacher must be successfully logged in with Teacher privileges via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when a Teacher selects Modify Roster.||
||                ||2. The Teacher will be asked to select a class from list of options. ||
||                ||2.1 If the Teacher selects a class, move on to step 3. ||
||                ||2.2 If the Teacher fails to select class, an error message will be shown reflecting that a class has not been chosen.||
||                ||3. The Teacher will be presented with a roster for the chosen class.||
||                ||3.1 The Teacher will optionally select one or more students to remove from the chosen class. ||
||                ||3.2 The Teacher will optionally select/type (method TBD) the name of one or more students to add to the chosen course. ||
||                ||4. The Teacher will receive a message, “Roster Successfully Modified” along with a list of changes made to the roster. ||
||Post Condition:|| 1. The Roster for the modified class will now show the updated class list.||
